name: decleh
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3

body.origin:
|- wbr(cdc(c0, c1), cle, cdc(c2, c3))
-| wcel(cdc(c0, c1), cr)
-| wcel(cdc(c2, c3), cr)
-| wbr(cdc(c0, c1), clt, cdc(c2, c3))
body.pretty:
⊢ cdc(c0, c1)[≤]cdc(c2, c3)
⊣ cdc(c0, c1)∈ ℝ
⊣ cdc(c2, c3)∈ ℝ
⊣ cdc(c0, c1)[<]cdc(c2, c3)

cumulated.origin:
|- wbr(cdc(c0, c1), cle, cdc(c2, c3))
-| wcel(cdc(c0, c1), cr)
-| wcel(cdc(c2, c3), cr)
-| wbr(cdc(c0, c1), clt, cdc(c2, c3))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ cdc(c0, c1)[≤]cdc(c2, c3)
⊣ cdc(c0, c1)∈ ℝ
⊣ cdc(c2, c3)∈ ℝ
⊣ cdc(c0, c1)[<]cdc(c2, c3)

body.origin:
|- wcel(cdc(c0, c1), cr)
-| wcel(cdc(c0, c1), cn0)
body.pretty:
⊢ cdc(c0, c1)∈ ℝ
⊣ cdc(c0, c1)∈ ℕ0

cumulated.origin:
|- wbr(cdc(c0, c1), cle, cdc(c2, c3))
-| wcel(cdc(c2, c3), cr)
-| wbr(cdc(c0, c1), clt, cdc(c2, c3))
-| wcel(cdc(c0, c1), cn0)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ cdc(c0, c1)[≤]cdc(c2, c3)
⊣ cdc(c2, c3)∈ ℝ
⊣ cdc(c0, c1)[<]cdc(c2, c3)
⊣ cdc(c0, c1)∈ ℕ0

body.origin:
|- wcel(cdc(c0, c1), cn0)
-| wcel(c0, cn0)
-| wcel(c1, cn0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wbr(cdc(c0, c1), cle, cdc(c2, c3))
-| wcel(cdc(c2, c3), cr)
-| wbr(cdc(c0, c1), clt, cdc(c2, c3))
-| wcel(c0, cn0)
-| wcel(c1, cn0)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ cdc(c0, c1)[≤]cdc(c2, c3)
⊣ cdc(c2, c3)∈ ℝ
⊣ cdc(c0, c1)[<]cdc(c2, c3)
⊣ c0 ∈ ℕ0
⊣ c1 ∈ ℕ0

body.origin:
|- wcel(cdc(c2, c3), cr)
-| wcel(cdc(c2, c3), cn0)
body.pretty:
⊢ cdc(c2, c3)∈ ℝ
⊣ cdc(c2, c3)∈ ℕ0

cumulated.origin:
|- wbr(cdc(c0, c1), cle, cdc(c2, c3))
-| wbr(cdc(c0, c1), clt, cdc(c2, c3))
-| wcel(c0, cn0)
-| wcel(c1, cn0)
-| wcel(cdc(c2, c3), cn0)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ cdc(c0, c1)[≤]cdc(c2, c3)
⊣ cdc(c0, c1)[<]cdc(c2, c3)
⊣ c0 ∈ ℕ0
⊣ c1 ∈ ℕ0
⊣ cdc(c2, c3)∈ ℕ0

body.origin:
|- wcel(cdc(c2, c3), cn0)
-| wcel(c2, cn0)
-| wcel(c3, cn0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wbr(cdc(c0, c1), cle, cdc(c2, c3))
-| wbr(cdc(c0, c1), clt, cdc(c2, c3))
-| wcel(c0, cn0)
-| wcel(c1, cn0)
-| wcel(c2, cn0)
-| wcel(c3, cn0)

body.origin:
|- wbr(cdc(c0, c1), clt, cdc(c2, c3))
-| wcel(c0, cn0)
-| wcel(c2, cn0)
-| wcel(c1, cn0)
-| wcel(c3, cn0)
-| wbr(c1, cle, nat9)
-| wbr(c0, clt, c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wbr(cdc(c0, c1), cle, cdc(c2, c3))
-| wcel(c0, cn0)
-| wcel(c1, cn0)
-| wcel(c2, cn0)
-| wcel(c3, cn0)
-| wbr(c1, cle, nat9)
-| wbr(c0, clt, c2)

comment: Comparing two decimal integers (unequal higher places). (Contributed by AV, 17-Aug-2021.) (Revised by AV, 8-Sep-2021.)
